/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is teeming with life, lined with a variety of buildings and shops that add to the city's vibrant atmosphere. Cars and pedestrians can be seen traversing the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. In the foreground, trees and bushes add a touch of nature to the urban setting.
